title: Lounge v1.3 - Clean Elegant WordPress Theme
description:
LOUNGE is a high quality professional WordPress theme for modern business or interactive creative use. Choose between 4 fluid AJAX animations, create unlimited Parallax pages, add unlimited sliders & slides to each page using two types of built-in sliders, take advantage of awesome Revolution Slider. Build you web site using our highly intuitive and friendly to use framework.

Main Features:

AJAX Animations ON/OFF Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Choose between 4 fluid AJAX animated transitions between pages for a creative experience or turn AJAX off to create a classic website. Besides the predefined animations, create your own scenario by choosing animation type for any page individually.

Bonus Parallax Pages Ã¢â‚¬â€œ LOUNGE comes with an amazing bonus feature Ã¢â‚¬â€œ easy to create Parallax pages perfect for presentations, microsites or a new homepage.

Slider Revolution Responsive WordPress Plugin included ($15 value) Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Create a responsive(mobile friendly) or fullwidth slider with must-see-effects and meanwhile keep or build your SEO optimization (all content always readable for search engines)

Easy-To-Use Powerful Admin Interface Ã¢â‚¬â€œ LOUNGE comes with very intuitive, easy to use admin interface. Add unlimited sliders and slides while you are editing page/post/portfolio, add unlimited portfolio images or videos while editing your portfolio item, add unlimited parallax section to any page.

Three Drop-down Menus Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Choose between default drop down, wide modern drop down and elegant menu.

Elegant, Professional Design Ã¢â‚¬â€œ This theme is designed by a team of professional designers focused on user-experience and minimalist style.

Fully Responsive Ã¢â‚¬â€œ LOUNGE is a fully responsive Wordpress theme and works perfectly on all screen sizes and mobile devices.

Extremely Customizable Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Unlimited colors and sizes for all elements, 500+ Google fonts and a robust backend offers a solution for a variety of business or personal uses.

Flexible Layout Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Use our demo layout or create your own visually different experience using our modular shortcodes and feature-rich backend.

Modular Shortcodes Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Get creative with unlimited combinations of easy-to-use shortcodes and quickly create any type of page you like.

Translation Ready Ã¢â‚¬â€œ This theme is fully prepared for translation to any language

Search Engine Optimized Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Search engines will easily index any page of your website because of the integrated search engine support. Set meta keywords and description for each individual page and increase SEO ranking.

Perfect Code Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Coded in HTML5, CCS3 and jQuery, this skillfully constructed theme is 100% valid.

Modular Contact Page Ã¢â‚¬â€œ You can set any combination between Google maps, Contact Form and regular content.

Child Theme Ready Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Create child theme starting from included dummy child theme.

Product page: http://themeforest.net/item/lounge-clean-elegant-wordpress-theme/4616086

This wordpress theme has been fully nulled, to install simply upload it to your host like you would any other wordpress theme.
